website_summaries.verdict: Not only will you get good value with these five gold masks, but chances are you'll see some improvements in your facial skin.
pros: Has a nice feel on the face, thanks to the gel consistency
Makes skin feel soft and moisturized for most who try them
A solid deal – you get five masks for the price
cons: Packaging is a bit difficult to open, and lacks instructions on what to do after removing the masks from your face
Eye/nose/mouth holes don't line up precisely for all users

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS...IS FULL OF FUNGUS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have different location Spa Centers, and I order these masks for our promotions. In all locations we got this product delivered, and in all the Masks were disgusting, wet and full of Fungus... a disaster. All products MUST pass a quality check, how this product was allowed for sale on Amazon??? Don't loose your time and money. YOU HAVE BEING WARNED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: OH, no no no!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived looking like this. I'd say. 1. I'm highly allergic to black mold. My lips are swelling. 2. I will NOT be putting this on my face. PS. a star rating would be a NEGATIVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: Moldy product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. It appears two out of the five masks leaked and caused the box to get wet and moldy. Two of the masks look drier than the other 3. The backside of one mask looks like it was moist and the box looks as if it was wet for a long period of time. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: It’s awful!!! From the minute I tried separating it from its packing which was like getting a leaf out of cement to giving it the required leave on time it was terrriblr. the Irritated my skin, only to reason the box “ Do not use if you have Sensitive Skin “it doesn’t mention anywhere on Amazon not to use on Sensitive Skin! A condition I was not aware of until I took off this mask and was irritated.
customer_reviews.author: helaine

customer_reviews.title: Burns my eyes and didn't do anything for my skin
customer_reviews.text: Did not see any noticeable improvements to the skin, wouldn't recommend and won't be repurchasing. I don't know what ingredient is doing this, but it really burns my eyes when I put the mask on. I am not getting any of the serum in my eyes, it is like the vapors from the mask are getting in my eyes and it is really uncomfortable and unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Doppel

customer_reviews.title: Feels incredible on skin but packaging is a pain
customer_reviews.text: These feel incredible on the skin and don't have an overwhelming scent like some masks. I wouldn’t recommend for super super sensitive skin as the liquid burns around the under eye area if you aren’t very careful avoiding it, but on the rest of the face it’s fine. The packaging is heavy duty and very difficult to open, especially around the mouth nose and eyes. The force to get the package open can rip the mask easily. Overall I like them, but wish there was a better way to open.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned when I received this item. It had mildew inside the box, the first mask I pulled was already opened and mildewed. The second mask I pulled practically fell apart before I could get it in my face. I tried this product before, but from an associate... and it seemed amazing... not sure what went wrong with this batch I received... I assumed the rest was ok and now I’m stuck with a bunch of defective face mask! I should have also read the other reviews before purchasing, apparently this fungus and mildewing product is being delivered all over! Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Jo S

customer_reviews.title: It looks fun. The fluid is not very thick tho
customer_reviews.text: It looks fun. The fluid is not very thick tho. I gave it 4 stars is because I did not see any difference after I use it. Maybe take some time to see the difference!
customer_reviews.author: dbwindy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste $13
customer_reviews.text: If you get an undamaged package, the masks work just fine. But the packaging is atrocious and half of my package arrived with leaky, open masks. The box housing the masks was completely soaked upon arrival. Thankfully mine weren’t moldy, as other folks have mentioned. But it’s easy to see how the mold happens. Step up your quality control & packaging game!
customer_reviews.author: A Linder

customer_reviews.title: Turn Back Time! Gets rid of wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these face masks I saved the little bit of liquid that comes out after and put it in a mini squirt bottle and use it throughout the day at is amazing makes my skin feel brand new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gold masks that slide around on your face and dry up to fast to make a difference in the skin.
customer_reviews.text: Masks are too slimy to stay in place until it dries up. No scent and not user friendly. Not a mask I will try again. No difference in my skin after the mask treatment. Not happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: blasher1313

customer_reviews.title: Soft and dewy skin
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to get out the package. But I guess that’s the point so it won’t leak. This made my face soft and dewy. I didn’t have to wear any makeup for a couple of days. I loved it. I’m almost hitting 40 and my daughter is a teen... worked well for both our skin. Will buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Elena S

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Strong chemical smell and no moisturizing effect at all. It was a very disappointing christmas gift.

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a girls bday party. They were a bit big, really for adult faces, but he girls loved them.

customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical from reviews. But was great! We used for girls impromptu zoom night. Didn't break out Skin was glowing after use.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to take out of packaging. Smells disgusting. Falls apart trying to take it out of package.

customer_reviews.title: It’s working!
customer_reviews.text: Big difference! Skin looks And feels more fuller and fine lines and wrinkles are less noticeable, by me! And I am my greatest critic . Looking forward to using at least weekly. It looks like a great choice and I have sensitive skin. I’m a 60+ fair skin African-American women.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this product! Every single mask was broken inside the package. The masks had a very bad old odor and smelled like fungus. What a waste of money. I would like a refund but then I’m ask to send the product back. There is nothing to send back they are all in the garbage! Horrible! So beyond disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Pass..

customer_reviews.text: These are some of my favorite masks. My skin always glows after. I also don’t wash after. I let it sink into my skin even after I take the mask off.

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These are literally like magic erasers for your bags. They say leave on for 20 minutes but I sleep in them. I was in a wedding and was crying my eyes out the night before and my eyes were so poofy. The next day it was like magic! I would give these 20 Stars if I could. For the price you can’t ask for a better product. I ended buying 100!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on. Even if laying down
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. The mask slips off the face even at the slightest angle... then if you try to fix it you will rip a hole in it. Bad material. My face didn’t look or feel any different after wearing it for 30 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product!

customer_reviews.title: Does it all!

customer_reviews.title: Came very quick they look great and are very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Came very quick they look great and are very heavy. Wonder if that's because of the gold. They are Christmas gifts so hopefully they will be as great as promised.

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not so sure how useful
customer_reviews.text: Well. They're interesting. From start to finish: Well packaged! These are sensitive items! They come individually packed in plastic and foil backing. It is an adventure to get it out! Difficult to open. The mask feels like those gel stick ons for Windows? But wet. The essence it's wet in is liquid. Like water but thinner so I'm not sure what this mask absorbs/holds onto/delivers to the skin. As far as wear, very little tenting. It fits amazing and mind your nails! It will slice it! My face felt nice after but I'm not sure if it's because I exfoliated before I wore it or.. It's fun. All I can say
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !!!
customer_reviews.text: these are dope!! I just got these today and used it for the first time and man what a difference !!! I have dark circles under my eyes and still do but they do make a difference enough for me to order another set even though I have 4 masks left, im a guy by the way

customer_reviews.text: This is a very refreshing mask that I highly recommend wearing 2-3 times a week. I wear this mask at night usually for about 20 minutes and my face is instantly smooth and feels incredibly hydrated. I always wake up the next day with a nice glow to my face. I really think it is enhancing my skin and making my face more youthful. I am going to keep ordering this product. Definitely worth it and surprisingly very inexpensive. You would think this would be a $100 product how great it is.
